description:
This presentation presents the challenges of tracking and managing the state of long-running tasks in distributed systems implemented in Python, and abstract ideas to solve them. 
Please keep in mind that this is a light presentation with only high-level abstract examples, without detailed Python code implementations, although there are code examples. 

Lee Sang-hoon 
A third-year Python developer. A junior who thinks a lot about what makes good software. TMI: I like CrossFit, meat, and bread.
title: Async State Machine
